definition: to be in (some state, position, or condition)
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: Thinking structure in childhood in the development of the critical period.
sentences.chinese: 思維結構在兒童期處於發生發展的關鍵期。

sentences.english: They were always at the state of curiosity.
sentences.chinese: 他們一直處於好奇的狀態。

sentences.english: The air is rather unstable near the moisture frontal zone.
sentences.chinese: 同時有很強的溼度鋒區，大氣處於不穩定狀態。

sentences.english: They found themselves in a passive position under attack.
sentences.chinese: 他們發現自己處於被動挨打的局面。

sentences.english: However, the accumulative concentrations of DDT and BHC in 1998 was much higher than that of some foreign countries.
sentences.chinese: 但1998年的蓄積水平與國外相比仍處於較高水平。

sentences.english: Vapor starts to form, because it wants to be in the coexistence line.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽開始形成，因爲體系要處於共存狀態。

sentences.english: When the police arrived, they sent Chen to hospital. After intensive rescue, Chen is still in coma.
sentences.chinese: 經醫院搶救，陳勇軍目前仍處於昏迷之中。

sentences.english: Nearly half of all ger dwellers live below the poverty line.
sentences.chinese: 將近一半的蒙古包居民的生活水平處於貧困線以下。

sentences.english: Men, as a rule of thumb, should always keep their nails clipped.
sentences.chinese: 男人一般來說都應該保持指甲處於修剪過的狀態。

sentences.english: Test machine operation of breaker when the truck in test position (control wiring male contact plug into patera).
sentences.chinese: 讓手車處於試驗位置，可進行斷路器的機械操作試驗。

sentences.english: Position the hose at a downspout drain to discharge then let go of the crimp.
sentences.chinese: 位置處於降排水軟管燃放然後放過了捲曲。

sentences.english: And right in-between thinking and doing, I would say, there is experience.
sentences.chinese: 正處於思想和行爲之間的，我會說，是經驗。

sentences.english: But he is also under the gun from lawmakers over Bank Century.
sentences.chinese: 但是他也處於世紀銀行調查的槍口之下。

sentences.english: The physician has gone into semiretirement because of ill health.
sentences.chinese: 這位醫生由於健康不佳已經處於半退休狀態了。

sentences.english: Decreased overall still in channels, short-short pattern is unchanged.
sentences.chinese: 總體仍處於下跌通道中，短期空頭格局不變。

sentences.english: Madam Michel found her in an awkward position.
sentences.chinese: 米雪女士發現自己處於一個尷尬的境地。
